subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Marc Gasol, the Grizzlies’ center, who moved to Memphis with his family when his brother Pau started his N.B.A. career, has become the face of the franchise.
snippet: Marc Gasol, the Grizzlies’ center, who moved to Memphis with his family when his brother Pau started his N.B.A. career, has become the face of the franchise.
